item.title: Blog Post #1: Introducing Shimeah
item.description: Introduction Meet Shimeah. He’s a 10-year-old boy who inhabits a traditional three-room dwelling in Mizpah with his widowed mother, Naarah. As a fatherless child, he The Why I chose to focus on a fatherless orphan because I wanted to explore the societal role of orphans, widows, and foreigners, who are often discussed together in Israel’s laws.
